content: The best way to fight this foe is by sticking behind it. The Flint Vanguard punches into the ground with its fists and has a sweeping attack that reaches either side of the beast, but both can be avoided by staying directly behind the creature.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The best way to fight this foe is by sticking behind it. The Flint Vanguard punches into the ground with its fists and has a sweeping attack that reaches either side of the beast, but both can be avoided by staying directly behind the creature.
